ctx: intros a b Q Hreduce Hcanonical Hcomb.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : list (Term A n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Hreduce : reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q a b Hcanonical : canonical A0 eqA ltM a Hcomb : CombLinear Q a H : olist (A:=A) ltM a H0 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) a Unable to unify "CombLinear ?M2233 (pO A n)" with "CombLinear Q b".

ctx: intros a b Q Hreduce Hcanonical Hcomb.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros a b Q Hreduce Hcanonical Hcomb.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : list (Term A n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) Hreduce : reduce A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q a b Hcanonical : canonical A0 eqA ltM a Hcomb : CombLinear Q a H : olist (A:=A) ltM a H0 : nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) a a0 : Term A n p, q : list (Term A n) H1 : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a0 H2 : inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM q Q H3 : CombLinear Q p H4 : eqP A eqA n a (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults multA (n:=n) a0 q) p) Unable to unify "olist (A:=A) ltM a" with "False".

ctx: intros a b Q Hreduce Hcanonical Hcomb.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros a b Q Hreduce Hcanonical Hcomb.

original: intros a b Q Hreduce Hcanonical Hcomb. inversion Hcanonical; subst. - apply CombLinear_0. - inversion Hcomb; subst. + apply (CombLinear_1 a); auto. * apply H1. * apply H6. * apply H3. * apply H7. - inversion Hcomb; subst. + exfalso; apply H. + apply (CombLinear_1 a); auto. * apply H1. * apply H6. * apply H3. * apply H7.
